message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be incredibly valuable for you. I'm asking for $16,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate its value, but I am only able to offer $10,000 for it. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but the product's value is significantly higher to me. How about we meet in the middle at $14,000?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I've given it some thought and am willing to increase my offer to $12,500. I hope this is closer to what you're looking for.
